mapper.select: select c.product_number, c.product_ea, p.product_name_kor, p.product_price, p.category_number, p.product_system_name from cart c join product p on c.product_number = p.product_number where c.user_number = #{userNumber}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where user_number = #{userNumber} and product_number = #{productNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into cart (user_number, product_number, product_total_price, product_ea) values(#{userNumber}, #{productNumber}, #{productTotalPrice}, #{productEa})
